org.kynosarges.tektosyne.subdivision

Interface SubdivisionMap<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of all objects to map to Subdivision faces
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PolygonGridMap, VoronoiMap

    public interface SubdivisionMap<T>
    Maps the faces of a planar Subdivision to arbitrary objects. Provides an application-specific mapping of all Subdivision.faces() of a planar Subdivision to arbitrary objects. The use of an interface allows clients to implement the most efficient mapping for their concrete Subdivision structure and object type.

    Since the Subdivision has no knowledge of any SubdivisionMap instances that reference it, clients must manually update any such instances whenever the underlying Subdivision changes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T fromFace(SubdivisionFace face)
      Converts the specified SubdivisionFace into the associated T instance.
      Subdivision source()

      Gets the Object that defines all mapped T instances.

      Converts the specified T instance into the associated SubdivisionFace.

    • Method Detail

      • source

        Subdivision source()
        Gets the Subdivision that contains all mapped Subdivision.faces(). Never null. Multiple SubdivisionMap implementations may refer to the same source(), mapping its Subdivision.faces() to different objects.
        Returns:
        the Subdivision that contains all Subdivision.faces() accepted and returned by fromFace(org.kynosarges.tektosyne.subdivision.SubdivisionFace) and toFace(T), respectively

      • target

        java.lang.Object target()
        Gets the Object that defines all mapped T instances. May be null if providing a container for all associated T instances is impossible or inconvenient.
        Returns:
        the Object that defines all T instances returned and accepted by fromFace(org.kynosarges.tektosyne.subdivision.SubdivisionFace) and toFace(T), respectively

      • fromFace

        T fromFace(SubdivisionFace face)
        Converts the specified SubdivisionFace into the associated T instance.
        Parameters:
        face - the SubdivisionFace to convert
        Returns:
        the T instance associated with face
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if source() does not contain face
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if face is null

      • toFace

        SubdivisionFace toFace(T value)
        Converts the specified T instance into the associated SubdivisionFace.
        Parameters:
        value - the T instance to convert
        Returns:
        the SubdivisionFace associated with value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if value does not map to any SubdivisionFace within source()
